channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: For some Americans, the end of the Vietnam War after Saigon fell 50 years ago is still deeply felt
item.description: The Vietnam War that ended after the fall of Saigon 50 years ago greatly impacted U.S. society. For some Americans, it still shapes their lives today.

item.title: Layoffs, closures and gaps in oversight expected after hundreds of DOJ grants are canceled
Decision looming for Trump administration on first PFAS drinking water limits
